resources.string:
This is module for Xposed framework. 
 It helps translate interface of MIUI v6 by replacing application resources.
 How to use it:
 1) create folder in SDcard \dv_translate\application_name
 application_name is exactly name of application package (example: com.android.settings) 
 2) put in it files with translated strings "strings.xml" arrays "arrays.xml" list of pictures "drawables.xml" and pictures itself. 
 Module will try to replace string resources when application started.
